Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4040 WILSON BOULEVARD,SUITE 1000, ARLINGTON, Virginia, 22203, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: AvalonBay Communities owns a portfolio of 275 apartment communities with over 75,000 units and is developing 18 additional properties with over 5,000 units. The company focuses on owning large, high-quality properties in major metropolitan areas of New England, New York/New Jersey, Washington D.C., California, and the Pacific Northwest.
